arts.ttl: Monaco moves closer to a Champions League spot after beating Marseille
arts.sum: Japan forward Takumi Minamino, Switzerland striker Breel Embolo and captain Denis Zakaria scored at Stade Louis II as Monaco leapfrogged Marseille and moved into second place. Monaco moved closer to a Champions League spot for next season after downing struggling Ligue 1 rival Marseille 3-0 at home on Saturday.

arts.sum: Monaco completed a dominant win over Marseille to rise to second and boost their Champions League hopes thanks to goals from Takumi Minamino, Breel Embolo, and Denis Zakaria. THE MATCH …
